name: Parking Roulette
description:
Get the cars to their correct parking spots before the timer reaches 0. The faster you can complete each level, the more points you will earn, but make sure not to let the cars collide.


RoleNameProgrammerChristopher Robertson
ArtistJamie Vodden
ArtistTabbie Lawson

Font Used: https://www.dafont.com/pixel-art.font
